item.title: Useful Visual Studio keyboard shortcuts
item.description: Why learn keyboard shortcuts? So I confess I have no empirical evidence to backup the up to 20% more productive claim. That number is just made up, but with years of experience on my side, it honestly feels fairly accurate to me!
